Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agent

  • public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    The Agent class hold all information about agents in the system and is responsible for the coloring and energy management of the agents.
    Author:
    Peter Eredics

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.awt.Color color
      The calculated color of the agent based on the inTeamId value.
      boolean colorOverriden
      Indicate if the agent manually changed it's color
      int direction
      The actual orientation of the agent.
      private int energy
      The actual energy level of the agent.
      long executionTime
      Total execution time of the agent
      private java.awt.Color formerColor
      The original color of the agent (is former when the agent is highlighted)
      private boolean highlighted
      Whether the agent is highlighted on the GUI
      int id
      The numerical agent identifier.
      int inTeamId
      ID of the agent in the team
      java.lang.String label
      The string agent identifier set by the agent itself.
      java.lang.String lastAction
      Last external action executed by the agent
      java.lang.String lastAttackedBy
      The perception of the agent who attacked the agent last
      (package private) static Agent maxEnergyAgent
      The agent having the highest energy level
      private ModelInterface model
      The model of the world
      java.lang.String name
      The string agent identifier used by Jason.
      Position position
      The actual position of the agent.
      Team team
      The team of the agent.

      Increase the total execution time of the agent and it's team

      Update agent color based on its idInTeam value and the number of other agents in the team.

      Set the energy level of the agent - used when new agents join the game or are under attack

      Select the id of the agent in the team

      • Agent

        public Agent(int id,
     java.lang.String name,
     Position position,
     int direction,
     int energy,
     Team team,
     ModelInterface model)
        Constructor of the Agent object, setting all variables.
        Parameters:
        id - The numerical agent identifier.
        name - The string agent identifier used by Jason.
        position - The actual position of the agent.
        direction - The actual orientation of the agent.
        energy - The actual energy level of the agent.
        team - The team of the agent.
        model - The model of the game world.

    • Method Detail

      • forceColor

        public void forceColor(int r,
              int g,
              int b)
        Select color manually for the agent and protect it from future automatic updates.
        Parameters:
        r - Red channel value.
        g - Green channel value.
        b - Blue channel value.

      • refreshColor

        public void refreshColor()
        Update agent color based on its idInTeam value and the number of other agents in the team.

      • hasEnergy

        public boolean hasEnergy(int actionEnergy)
        Check if the agent has enough energy for an action.
        Parameters:
        actionEnergy - The energy needed for the action
        Returns:
        Return true if the agent has enough energy

      • burnEnergy

        public void burnEnergy(int actionEnergy)
        Decrease the agent's energy based on the parameter and update the strongest agent reference if necessary.
        Parameters:
        actionEnergy - The energy needed for the action

      • gainEnergy

        public void gainEnergy(int newEnergy)
        Increase agent energy level and update the strongest agent if necessary.
        Parameters:
        newEnergy - The amount of energy to increase with.

      • getEnergy

        public int getEnergy()
        Get the energy level of the agent.
        Returns:
        The energy level of the agent.

      • setEnergy

        public void setEnergy(int newEnergy)
        Set the energy level of the agent - used when new agents join the game or are under attack
        Parameters:
        newEnergy - The energy level of the agent.

      • toggleHighlighting

        public void toggleHighlighting()
        Turn on/off agent highlighting on the GUI
